game.name: Gorilla Tag
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 전용, 앱 내 구매
game.shortDescription: Run, jump, and climb using only your hands. Play tag or infection with people online. Run away from the infected players, or outmaneuver the survivors to catch them. Embrace your inner ape.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run, jump, and climb using only your hands. Play tag or infection with people online. Run away from the infected players, or outmaneuver the survivors to catch them. Embrace your inner ape.

reviewHighlights.text: 아니 고릴라 태그 들어가는데 계속 나가져요
